state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, go to the east. And then, take a trip east. Then, head south. With that over with, try to go to the west. After that, travel south. Then, make an attempt to head south. And then, make an effort to move east. If you can accomplish that, go to the south. And then, venture west. After that, venture west. Following that, attempt to travel north. And then, make an attempt to move north. And then, try to move west. That done, lift the butterfly from the floor of the cookery. And once you've done that, you win! -= Study =- You arrive in a study. An usual kind of place. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Study =-0/1
next_state: -= Kitchen =- You find yourself in a kitchen. An usual kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure. You can make out a freezer. Classic TextWorld. Hey, want to see a chair? Look over there, a chair. The chair is normal. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Kitchen =-0/2
